title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 311.9 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 311.9 - Public notice

State Regulations
A notice containing the title or name and business address
of the records access officer and appeals person or body and the location where
records can be seen or copied shall be posted in a conspicuous location
wherever records are kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
311.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
